data.eml:eml: Cave Pygmarrhopalites Vargovitsh, 2009 (Collembola, Symphypleona, Arrhopalitidae) in United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zeppelini, Douglas, Taylor, Steven J., Slay, Michael E. (2009): Cave Pygmarrhopalites Vargovitsh, 2009 (Collembola, Symphypleona, Arrhopalitidae) in United States. Zootaxa 2204: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189689
